title: mAtanga tanayAyai
sahitya:
mAtanga tanayAyai mangaLam


anupallavi

  (bhUyO) manasijAri kAntAyai mangaLam


caraNam 1    bahaLa kumkumapanga pATalita kucAyaimahiSAsura hArNyai mangaLam
 caraNam 2    kari rAja gamanAyau vara tApata sancayasmaraNIya caraNAyai mangaLam
 caraNam 3    vara nadI taTakAyai vanaja nAbhAnujAyaimarakata mEcakAngyai mangaLam
